name: ailumina-exploratory-tests
description: Exploratory tests for external API integrations and third-party services

scripts.test:all: npm run test:gemini && npm run test:anthropic && npm run test:openai
scripts.test:all:formats: npm run test:gemini:formats && npm run test:anthropic:formats && npm run test:openai:formats
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '' && echo 'Google Gemini API:' && echo '  npm run test:gemini          - Validate our current implementation' && echo '  npm run test:gemini:formats  - Test all response formats' && echo '  npm run test:gemini:debug    - Debug API connection' && echo '' && echo 'Anthropic API:' && echo '  npm run test:anthropic        - Validate our current implementation' && echo '  npm run test:anthropic:formats - Test all response formats' && echo '  npm run test:anthropic:debug  - Debug API connection' && echo '  npm run test:anthropic:blocks - Test tool use block scenarios' && echo '' && echo 'OpenAI API:' && echo '  npm run test:openai          - Validate our current implementation' && echo '  npm run test:openai:formats  - Test all response formats' && echo '  npm run test:openai:debug    - Debug API connection' && echo '  npm run test:openai:calling  - Test tool calling scenarios' && echo '' && echo 'Combined Tests:' && echo '  npm run test:all             - Run all provider validations' && echo '  npm run test:all:formats     - Run all format tests' && echo '' && echo 'Environment Variables:' && echo '  GOOGLE_API_KEY     - For Gemini tests' && echo '  ANTHROPIC_API_KEY  - For Claude tests' && echo '  OPENAI_API_KEY     - For OpenAI tests'

author: AIlumina Team
